data.eml:eml: A new species of Oxypleurodon Miers, 1886 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Majoidea) from the Bismarck Sea, Papua New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Forges, Bertrand Richer De, Corbari, Laure (2012): A new species of Oxypleurodon Miers, 1886 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Majoidea) from the Bismarck Sea, Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 3320: 56-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281183
